message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This unique item is worth $1200000 to you, and I am excited to extend an offer to purchase it at a price that reflects its true worth. I propose to sell the product to you for $1150000. This offer not only ensures that you secure this valuable asset at a price that is highly favorable but also allows me to maximize the return on my investment. I believe this is a win-win situation for both of us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
